channel.title: Granite maul Hit npc
channel.description: Hello fellow moparscapians, Im using a project insanity 508 source and client, and i was wondering how can i make granite maul spec work to hit npc's? everytime i go to use the special while attacking an npc it doesnt let me do it :@ but it works on players :S if someone could please help that would be greatly appreciated :D
